00035 
00036 ResourceString::ResourceString(void)
00037   : m_mapStrings(LANG_COUNT)
00038 {
00039 }
00040 
00041 ResourceString::ResourceString(const ResourceString& CLI_String)
00042   : m_mapStrings(CLI_String.m_mapStrings)
00043 {
00044 }
00045 
00046 ResourceString::~ResourceString(void)
00047 {
00048 }
00049 
00050 ResourceString& ResourceString::operator=(const ResourceString& CLI_String)
00051 {
00052     for (   LANG e_Lang = (LANG) 0;
00053             e_Lang < LANG_COUNT;
00054             e_Lang = (LANG) (e_Lang + 1))
00055     {
00056         if (CLI_String.HasString(e_Lang))
00057         {
00058             SetString(e_Lang, CLI_String.GetString(e_Lang));
00059         }
00060         else
00061         {
00062             SetString(e_Lang, "");
00063         }
00064     }
00065     return *this;
00066 }
00067 
00068 ResourceString& ResourceString::SetString(const ResourceString::LANG E_Lang, const char* const STR_String)
00069 {
00070     if (! m_mapStrings.SetAt(E_Lang, tk::String(MAX_RESOURCE_LENGTH, STR_String)))
00071     {
00072         GetTraces().Trace(INTERNAL_ERROR)
00073             << "Could not set resource '" << STR_String << "' "
00074             << "for language " << E_Lang
00075             << endl;
00076     }
00077     return *this;
00078 }
00079 
00080 const bool ResourceString::HasString(const ResourceString::LANG E_Lang) const
00081 {
00082     return m_mapStrings.IsSet(E_Lang);
00083 }
00084 
00085 const tk::String ResourceString::GetString(const ResourceString::LANG E_Lang) const
00086 {
00087     if (const tk::String* const pstr_String = m_mapStrings.GetAt(E_Lang))
00088     {
00089         return *pstr_String;
00090     }
00091     else
00092     {
00093         return tk::String(MAX_RESOURCE_LENGTH, "");
00094     }
00095 }
00096 
00097 const tk::String ResourceString::Concat(
00098         const char* const STR_1, const char* const STR_2)
00099 {
00100     return tk::String::Concat(MAX_RESOURCE_LENGTH, STR_1, STR_2);
00101 }
00102 
00103 const tk::String ResourceString::Concat(
00104         const char* const STR_1, const char* const STR_2, const char* const STR_3)
00105 {
00106     return tk::String::Concat(MAX_RESOURCE_LENGTH, STR_1, STR_2, STR_3);
00107 }
00108 
00109 const tk::String ResourceString::Concat(
00110         const char* const STR_1, const char* const STR_2, const char* const STR_3,
00111         const char* const STR_4)
00112 {
00113     return tk::String::Concat(MAX_RESOURCE_LENGTH, STR_1, STR_2, STR_3, STR_4);
00114 }
00115 
00116 const tk::String ResourceString::Concat(
00117         const char* const STR_1, const char* const STR_2, const char* const STR_3,
00118         const char* const STR_4, const char* const STR_5)
00119 {
00120     return tk::String::Concat(MAX_RESOURCE_LENGTH, STR_1, STR_2, STR_3, STR_4, STR_5);
00121 }
